  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="8098" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="8098" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.92</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1846">1,846</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="270"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Eternity Aqua for Men</b> by <b>Calvin Klein</b> is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Eternity Aqua for Men</b> was launched in 2010. Top notes are Cucumber, Citruses, Green Notes and Lotus; middle notes are Plum, Lavender, Sichuan Pepper and Virginia Cedar; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Patchouli and Guaiac Wood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>CK and Coty launched a woody aromatic fragrance Eternity Aqua for Men, which is presented on the market in 2010. Cover face of the new edition is Ben Hill - supermodel.</p>

<p>The new fragrance was created with an intention to presents a new face of Eternity edition for men, highlighted with a modern, casual, aquatic-woody composition. Eternity Aqua for Men opens with accords of cold cucumbers, citruses, lotus and green leaves. A heart blooms with a union of Sichuan pepper, Mirabelle plum, lavender and cedar, while a base finishes with sandalwood, Guaiac wood, patchouli and musk. The fragrance will be available from April 2010, as 30, 50 and100ml EDT.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353610" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ncfragnewbie87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ncfragnewbie87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292583">ncfragnewbie87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 18:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this will be strictly a gym scent for me. I've worn it a few times, and it just doesn't last long. I get about 3 hours, with very little projection. The smell is pleasant, but not particularly aquatic in my opinion. To me its more green and fruity. For $20 it's not a bad purchase, but it's probably not something I'd buy again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2353610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2353610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smelled like a harsh synthetic laundry detergent. Maybe it's fine in the air? I really disliked smelling it on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2325247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2325247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="axelcervantesml"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208865"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2208865.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="axelcervantesml" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Banana-Republic/Classic-11683.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11683.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Classic"title="Classic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208865">axelcervantesml</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 03:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had an interesting opening but the dry down is musty, like rotten vegetables. Whatever they put on the base, it's too much and robs away the freshness it could have had.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2307525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2307525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DaCrazyJamez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DaCrazyJamez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231592">DaCrazyJamez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TL:DR - Harsh opening but otherwise very good scent, terrible longevity.<br />
<br />
I blind bought this because of it's similar profiles to other fragrances I like but cheaper price tag. My immediate thought on first spray was that I mostly smelled alcohol, but thankfully that disappeared quite quickly. What remained was a refreshingly pleasant aroma - like a somewhat more mature Polo Blue or Nautica. It's a smell that can be a summer scent both day and night, unlike some brighter "blue" colognes.<br />
<br />
However, the major problem with this bottle didn't show up until a few hours after I put it on - or rather didn't show up. An hour after application this was a skin scent. By two hours, it was barely noticeable. By hour three it was gone completely. I am aware everyone has different body chemistry, and for me fragrances tend to wear off a bit on the quick side, but this is a contender for fastest vanishing act.<br />
<br />
So if I want to smell really good for a short while, this is a great find. If I want something that I can apply before leaving for the day, then I'll need to look elsewhere. This may become my summertime "keep-in-the-car" bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2280594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2280594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235886" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This cologne works surprisingly well on my skin. I bought this in a blind buy. I never expected him to do his job in beast mode like this!<br />
<br />
A clean salt water scent. The scent is pretty simple. Simple is sometimes very good. I love the musk in this scent. It's one of the cleanest scents I've ever smelled. When I wear this cologne, I feel clean and fresh as if I just got out of the shower. I often turn to this cologne for daily use in the summer. It's very easy to wear. In the high inflationary conditions in Turkey, this cologne is one of the colognes that can be ideal for daily use in the summer months with its cheap price.<br />
<br />
 I read in the comments on Fragrantica that it is similar to Polo Blue. I've never smelled Polo Blue before. I want to try this soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2235886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2235886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228928">DustyMemphis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 14:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@patsnotmyname, It doesn't take a full bottle to make a review :)<br />
<br />
@Clixwell, doesn't matter with the warm up, just spray 1 - 2 times on your shirt, instead of letting climate and your body chemistry be an issue to it's potential!!! Don't ever spray on skin, it's not good for you, it's just a way of smart business, to over-sell a product, because it last shorter = you buy more!!! Simple strategy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2231208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2231208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2208675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2208675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clixwell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clixwell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2208675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2208675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378260">Clixwell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-05">07/05/24 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had this around 2013, I had gotten it as a gift and I absolutely loved it. This was around the same year we had gotten a new house about 5km from the beach if not less. We also moved in during a hot summer so I wore this a lot and as one would figure, it created fantastic memories for that time.<br />
So I went and did what any fragrance lover worth their salt would do, I repurchased it. I didn't think much of changes in formulation or performance, I figured just the scent would be enough.<br />
<br />
I've been left a tiny bit disappointed though, I don't remember it being this flat. I wasn't expecting much but I'm left feeling a bit silly, with my dick in my hand. I'll keep trying it when it warms up where I am but ya, feeling a bit hollow about the repurchase, not cos of the money spent but because it's not exactly the scent I remember.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2208675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2208675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="patsnotmyname"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="patsnotmyname" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2138496">patsnotmyname</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 16:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heads up: I do NOT have a bottle of this, but a little dabber bottle, so I can't give any good advice on sprays or whatever.<br />
<br />
Scent 9.25/10<br />
The scent opens with the best opening I've ever smelled in a fragrance. Granted, I haven't smelled that many colognes but my lord it opens beautifully. If anyone knows a fragrance like this that lasts longer, let me know. Unfortunately, the opening only lasts like 5 minutes before becoming a bit of something else which I'm honestly okay with<br />
<br />
Sillage 3/10<br />
The only people who have ever noticed this on me are the people that I've specifically told that I'm wearing it and they've deliberately come up close to smell it, but other than that it's practically non-existent<br />
<br />
Longevity 3/10<br />
Same story<br />
<br />
I would put this in OK because of the performance, but the scent itself is just too good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2205154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2205154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199643" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alfthedoughnut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1970180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alfthedoughnut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970180">Alfthedoughnut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 21:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my first fragrance when I was just starting out. Everyone starts somewhere and most do with a cheap designer from their local stores. Honestly I still enjoy this although I never really wear it much anymore with my collection growing in size and quality. It smells almost nostalgic to me, like it has its own aquatic vibe that doesnt automatic scream beach or anything. It just kinda smells blue to me if that makes sense. Very refreshing too, Id love this as a thing to scent my room with more than Id like to wear as it dries down quite poorly for me.<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2199643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2199643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192448" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TrashBoat0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1909255.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TrashBoat0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ramz-Lattafa-Silver-71868.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71868.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ramz Lattafa Silver"title="Ramz Lattafa Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909255">TrashBoat0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 17:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's giving me Aqva Pour Homme Marine Bvlgari vibes [without the ocean/seaweed], and absolutely smells like Polo Blue but not as high quality.  What I thought were marine notes are probably the vegetal/lotus scents.  Great summertime frag; easy, light, aquatic.  This is also $29 vs $59 for the Polo.<br />
Update:  This isn't the strongest frag, so I tend to overspray.  There is a chemical smell that occurs when I use a few too many sprays.  Its an acrid, almost bitter chemical smell that only appears if I use too much.<br />
Edit:  Yeah it's still good, but that chemical harshness is there if you use even slightly enough to make it last.  I wish it was a little softer or more powdery like a YSL with some cardamom in there to cmooth it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2192448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2192448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188622" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kranski985"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171573.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kranski985" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Cool-Water-Wave-44618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cool Water Wave"title="Cool Water Wave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171573">Kranski985</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Calvin Klein Eternity Aqua for Men instantly captivated my senses in the best possible way. Intrigued by its distinct aroma, I asked a stranger about his cologne, and he was delighted to share. I could tell I made his day with my compliment.<br />
<br />
The sillage is exceptional, creating an aura within a two-meter radius, even more pronounced with a breeze. The scent reached me before I saw the wearer, which speaks volumes about its presence. Eternity Aqua offers a unique blend, borrowing from classic summery aqua fragrances while introducing its own distinctive character.<br />
<br />
Wearing it for the first time, Im consistently surprised by the refreshing wafts that emanate from me. The name "Aqua" is truly apt, and the Sichuan pepper note adds an intriguing twist that I find irresistible. I cant stop smelling my wrist. This is undoubtedly my new weekday go-to fragrance.<br />
<br />
Although its an Eau de Toilette, and thus not the longest-lasting, its brilliant and vibrant presence is like a shooting starbrief but unforgettable. At $69.99 for a 200ml bottle, its an absolute steal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2188622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2188622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Try it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2175039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2175039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165704" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="musicfat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="musicfat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Orage-49752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orage"title="Orage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041512">musicfat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells refreshing, my fav summer fragrance! Normally i dont wear blue type but this is cool and my type.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2165704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2165704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156332" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EmeraldMonster7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2127515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EmeraldMonster7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127515">EmeraldMonster7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest with all the freshblue fragrances on the market I cant find a reason for you to purchase this. It is out preformed and out shined by almost every other aquatic scent on the market right now. I do think the atomizer is decent for the price and the presentation is good but this was one of the worst blind buys Ive made (not like thats saying much). It doesnt smell bad just a lack luster and boring cucumber scent with synthetic citrusy tones. Just buy dolce &amp; gobanna light blue or versace pour homme/fraiche for a little more. It is a little different with its saltier accords but thats about it when it comes to uniqueness.<br />
<br />
Projection: 5/10<br />
Longevity: 3/10<br />
Sillage: 2/10<br />
Overall performance: 3/10<br />
Scent: 4/10<br />
Value: 7/10<br />
<br />
Overall: 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2156332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2156332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love salt so much, yes salt is a smell did you know that.<br />
<br />
10/10 scent when worn close to the coastline.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2155795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2155795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/717052">greenmile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>my favorite summer edt .... i have a lot of memories with it  ....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148747" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jax198803"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1846195.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jax198803" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846195">Jax198803</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 14:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most underrated fresh, peppery , cucumbery and very clean mass appealing scent profile with really decent performance, its my office scent for last 13 years in summer and I have worn it on Casual occasions, bars and Dates and it never let me down and got many complaints, indeed it have some Polo Blue vibe but this one have more character, Grab this underrated Gem before they discontinue it . 40 for 100ml and 50 for 200ml, get the 200ml , spray about 25 to 30 sprays and let it sit for  2 months and it will be more strong. I have currently 3 bottles (200ml) getting mature while one is on the lose .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2148747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2148747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874562">deja1sabel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 22:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a watery and overtly fresh opening with some citrusy floral undertones, that quickly becomes a plum heavy lavender with some woodiness to it. Its fruity, fresh, and cool just as the name suggests. The dry down feels smoother, less fresh and more so musky, with some soft woods, remnants of that fruity heart and a hint of herbal patchouli.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859802">websterdaniel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 01:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cucumber heavy. HEAVY. Then, I get the watery green notes, the lotus, citrus, patchouli and plum. <br />
<br />
It's a nice fragrance, got it at TJ Maxx for $20. I wouldn't buy again. The original is soooo much better. <br />
<br />
Definitely an office fragrance, not offensive, and I do like it. Not a love. I love the original Eternity for Men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2087792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2087792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062388" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LittleSir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LittleSir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497053">LittleSir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 15:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like shampoo or de-tangler hair spray.<br />
I am disappointed.<br />
Wanted to like it, but just couldn't and threw it in the trash after several wearings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2062388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2062388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040111" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Virgonid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1915360"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1915360.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Virgonid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1915360">Virgonid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 20:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find that the opening dissipates way too quickly, leaving just the oriental notes left on my skin. I had one colleague comment on how flat this fragrance smelled from when I sprayed in the office till the end of day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2040111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2040111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020797" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Shaghaf-Oud-50582.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50582.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shaghaf Oud"title="Shaghaf Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 23:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aquatic and musky a lot like Davioff Cool Water but with a completely different tone to it. Suitable for everyday wear and quite generic for a water scent but will never fail to get compliments and enquiries. It carries and projects well without being completely obnoxious. Definitely an improvement on Eternity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2020797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2020797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007990" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gentginge96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1614677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gentginge96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614677">Gentginge96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I quite like this fragrance. I have had Polo Blue Parfum sometime ago and heard that Eternity Aqua was similar in scent from reviews i had read so thought i would give this a try. <br />
<br />
It's a very fresh and aquatic fragrance that is a good daily scent for anytime. I think you can get away with this at a casual event too so work its perfect for and semi smart events too so a nice restaurant. I find it more of a spring summery scent or early autumn, although i think it can be suitable for anyone wanting to smell very fresh, clean and aquatic. <br />
<br />
It's also a good fragrance choice for someone looking for Polo Blue at a cheaper price. This can be bought cheaply in drug stores or online at a reasonable price of around 25.00-30.00 in the UK. Maybe cheaper on eBay. <br />
<br />
I would buy this again but i do like to cycle through dailies and try others to see how they sit on me, as fragrances always differ on the persons natural aroma. <br />
<br />
Silage is okay i think it lasts for about 2-3 hours depending on applications but max id say is 6 hours. I can smell it after a long day when i go to the gym and i get warm but its not overpowering. Just a nice clean scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2007990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2007990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000725" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danifettuccinni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1916428.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danifettuccinni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Salvo-Elixir-94166.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94166.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Salvo Elixir"title="Salvo Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000725ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000725" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916428">danifettuccinni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 21:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally love this. In spite of all the other fresh aquatic summer types of scents, something stands out to me. Its just a nice aquatic scent. The cucumber and lotus are well blended and peak through the aquatics nicely. <br />
<br />
Funny story, Ill need to buy a new bottle and heres why. I got a 6.7 fl oz bottle for roughly $35 from Fragrancenet.com. Had it for over a year, and enjoyed it. Left it in my car where the temperature fell below 32F. I thought it would be fine as fragrances are meant to be kept cool, but NO. It smells like pure harsh chemicals now. Dont make my mistake</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="2000725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=2000725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1977512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1977512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917777" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bygcoolrr44"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822326"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bygcoolrr44" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917777ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917777" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822326">bygcoolrr44</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Def for the summer and late spring. Crappy longevity 3-4 hrs. tops. Cucumber/ melon and citrus heavy opening transitions to plum and lavender. Sandalwood, musk, and patchouli on the back end. Good value. Decent projection for the price. I'd take this over Acqua Di Gio because of the price. They smell very similar. If you don't mind reapplying after 3-4 hrs., then get this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1917777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1917777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665763">ScentChimp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-06">08/06/23 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would buy this before spending $100 on Aqua di Gio that will give you just as horrible longevity. Fresh aquatic scents are all equally as boring and generic. Why spend a lot of money on them? You will get bored and trash them long before youre through more than an ounce of them. Buy small and buy from a discounter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1895604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1895604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875059" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="XOXO_marcel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="XOXO_marcel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tous/Tous-Gems-Party-66524.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66524.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tous Gems Party"title="Tous Gems Party"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392">XOXO_marcel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 17:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice summery aquatic! The cucumber helps it stand out from the crowd. Fresh, lightweight, and just slightly quirky. This would be the perfect scent for a teen boy or someone with an optimistic outlook.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1875059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1875059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1871621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1871621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tharan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1138264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tharan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-9099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel"title="Bleu de Chanel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1871621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1871621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138264">Tharan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-05">07/05/23 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aqua is something i tried before in Sephora. Tday sprayed it again on myself, well it is fresh bright citrus cucumber very airy , suitable for the country that I reside. the climate at my place is hot and humid so it is suitable. Is it worth it? Nah..the frag is nothing special, just generic type of smell. There are better and cheaper frags out there. Price is ok but the longevity is an issue just disappeared on my body after 1 hour, very safe fragrance to be worn even to office. Definitely a Summer frag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1871621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1871621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863721" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chaselark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402709"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chaselark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402709">Chaselark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-24">06/24/23 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Immediately reminiscent of Calvin Klein Contradiction  (due to the pepper) but lighter, perhaps mashed up with Eternity Cologne For Men (due to the aldehydes).   It's a dumb reach grab &amp; go, nothing to get excited about or impress anyone with and for the same use/purpose/wear I would take a Tommy Bahama cheapie like St. Kitts or St. Barts every time over this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1863721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1863721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1859446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1859446" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stephen N"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stephen N" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1859446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1859446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169218">Stephen N</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-18">06/18/23 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been on the hunt for what I can only describe as a "neutral oceanic fragrance," something that isn't obnoxiously sweet and fruity like so many can be, but isn't briny and salty the way some of them can be.  This is a step in the right direction toward what I've been after; this is very ozonic and airy smelling, with a slight mild aquatic feel to it, and not much else.  It's VERY simple, and I like that about this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1859446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1859446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/982086">Flatoutchad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-20">03/20/23 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After just reading "smellmyfingers" take on this, and really pondering on it, I changed my mind on what I was gonna post. I seen mentioned this used to be a powerhouse and realizing the $22 bottle I got, doesn't punch like I remember. Long ago when I first smelled it, when it came out, had that Polo Blue vibe but way more depth. I really loved it and still do but I can definitely see how much my taste has evolved over a decade. <br />
For the price, it's definitely toilet bowl lid worthy. You get the premium extra courtesy treatment. Thanks to "smellmyfingers" this won't just head to the back of my stuff that I thought was good that I just don't grab. Instead of letting them waste now, they go to the toilet bowl lid to die with dignity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1788360"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1788360#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1761162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
