It's pleasant enough but not something I would want to spray on myself. There are better inexpensive blue frags out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1757751"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1757751#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1753788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1753788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UsetheSchwartz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1122525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1122525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UsetheSchwartz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/La-Rive/Absolute-Sport-85138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolute Sport"title="Absolute Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1753788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1753788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1122525">UsetheSchwartz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-06">02/06/23 21:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy the opening. Hit's all those familiar and likable aquatic/blue notes. The dry-down sort of kills it for me though. I don't care for aquatics that turn to sharp wood, which is where this goes after ~20min to me. Longevity is what I'd expect for this brand/product.<br />
Scent opening - 9/10<br />
Scent drydown - 5/10 (not bad, not my cup of tea)<br />
Sillage - Moderate for ~20-30min, then intimate<br />
Performance - 5/10. It's average, expected for pricepoint and ingredients</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1753788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1753788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1752119" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1752119" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="divinefeminal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="divinefeminal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1752119ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1752119" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678758">divinefeminal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-04">02/04/23 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must say, it's a very interesting scent.<br />
I used to have this, thinking it would be more a unisex scent but I was mistaken. I decided to gift this cologne to my guy friend for his birthday and he loves it. <br />
It is a very fresh smell and is very clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1752119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1752119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1726922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1726922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Proximo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069703"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1069703.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Proximo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1726922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1726922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069703">Proximo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-06">01/06/23 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got a 100ml bottle for 25 bucks. My first thought: what a great value! <br />
<br />
It is similar to polo blue family, just like them,  smells fresh and crisp, is perfect for mornings right after shower. <br />
<br />
I would say it is a safe blind buy, will not offend anyone and 100% office safe. <br />
<br />
Personally, the most appealing part is that it is very fresh without depending solely upon citrus notes. Nowadays most male designer fragrances are either bubble gummy or citrus-y, this is neither of these, I get a little vintage 90s vibe.<br />
<br />
Conclusion: if you are looking for a fresh everyday fragrance and like watery notes, this can be a great alternative.<br />
<br />
Happy smelling!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1726922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1726922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1716100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1716100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1716100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeucemcgeuce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeucemcgeuce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/La-Yuqawam-Homme-19668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Yuqawam Homme"title="La Yuqawam Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556265">jeucemcgeuce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-20">12/20/22 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very light, crisp, penetrating scent. Not the same, but in the same category as Versace Man Eau Fraiche, with more oomph.<br />
<br />
I get more watery cucumber and citrus in the foreground, with musk and wood notes in the background. Not getting the lavender or plum; nothing is remarkably floral or sweet about it. <br />
<br />
I blind-bought it early on when I started collecting. I was not upset with it, but I have found many more options that would fill the role of a shower gel-Esque fragrance that I would choose over this one.<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1713821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1713821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713725" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="L&#039;Whiff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1625842.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="L&#039;Whiff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Wild-Drops-Parfums/Dirty-Forest-60071.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60071.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dirty Forest"title="Dirty Forest"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713725ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713725" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625842">L&#039;Whiff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-20">12/20/22 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is why bother for me. I get a sharp waft of alcohol when I spray it and when that dissipates there is nothing more than a faint shower gel type smell. I use it sometimes since I bath with natural unscented soap and want to use it up. I dose myself in 6 or 10 sprays as I'm drying off and I smell fresh for a bit. A good shower gel will perform as well but the scent is ok. Not worth much in my opinion though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1713725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1713725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1701695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1701695" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragrantBob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragrantBob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Vetiver-69.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver"title="Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1701695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1701695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353526">FragrantBob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-03">12/03/22 22:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yet another of the many flankers to the classic 1990s aromatic Eternity by Calvin Klein. Eternity Aqua is a great fragrance in it's own right and the scent is more contemporary than the original Eternity. Eternity Aqua is a fresh blue scent with reasonable longevity and performance and a very wearable, pleasant scent that is suitable for most occasions in the warmer months. The opening really catches me with some nice sweet fruity and fresh notes, smells almost unisex and brings to mind a sunny spring day. As the fragrance settles on my skin I detect a little of the pepper and then later in the dry-down it settles to a nice fresh scent with prominent floral and woody notes. For a cheaper fragrance Eternity Aqua is excellent, not an outstanding composition, but a very nice fragrance that has a decent trajectory. I've really enjoyed wearing Eternity Aqua and although the original Eternity for Men is also great and has more nostalgic value for me, I think I now favour Eternity Aqua more. Eternity Aqua lasts a good 6 or 7 hours on my skin and projection is arm length, becoming a more intimate skin scent by the end of the day. A nice summer freshie and excellent value.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1701695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1701695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1673493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1673493" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delancy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delancy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1673493ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1673493" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665">delancy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-24">10/24/22 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I 110% agree with Rockdj's review below.<br />
<br />
What I don't think anyone reviewing this now in 2022 realises is that they're smelling almost an entirely different fragrance from when this first came out. <br />
<br />
And no I'm not doing the usual Fragrantica "they reformulated this" meme. I have actual proof.<br />
<br />
I have two bottles, one I've held onto since 2012, the other from around 2019/2020 (hardly used, you'll soon find out why). The difference is dramatic. <br />
<br />
My 2012 bottle is a lot more clearer, cleaner, smoother, and aquatic, and almost has a kind of ever-so-slight sweetness to it that makes you want to bathe in it. The old formulation "cuts" through high humidity and doesn't build up and waft around you. At the time, it was a really sexy smell (it's dated now), and I used to get a ton of compliments on it from women.<br />
<br />
My 2019/2020 bottle is almost an entirely different fragrance and can be summed up by two words POWDERY SOAP. A nauseating old man powdery soap smell that is cloying in summer and high humidity. The old formulation "cuts" through humidity and heat, and this newer bottle hangs around you like a stomach-churning powdery musky soap cloud.<br />
<br />
My older bottle still has those powdery, musky notes, but it's pulled back BEHIND the clearer, cleaner, aquatic notes. The newer bottle is just boisterous cloying powdery, musky soap... It's gross.<br />
<br />
If someone did want to wear the modern version of this, I would actually recommend it as more of a spring scent. The new reformulation is now way too musky and cloying in high-heat and high-humidity situations. I'm an expat working in a highly humid/tropical area of the world, and there's no way I'd want to wear the newer version unless it was to make people gag around me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1673493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1673493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660210" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1607250" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rockdj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rockdj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Rocher/Sel-d-Azur-56454.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56454.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sel d'Azur"title="Sel d'Azur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1607250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1607250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7723">Rockdj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-20">07/20/22 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First of all i love this fragrance, i bought it in 2011 it was love at first smell, my bottle was from the very first batch. The fragrance was magnificent with great sillage, projection and longevity. A very nice and a super affordable aquatic fragrance. I got a new 6.8 oz bottle for my collection and what i got is a very downgrade watery fragrance of my beloved Eternity Aqua. Im really disappointed i cant believe what they have done to this fragrance, one of the best eternity flankers ever made. I can even barely smell it on my clothes, no projection, nobody commenting about the fragrance the magic is over. I hope my bottle is the only broken one, if anyone has experienced this feeling with a current batch of eternity aqua, please let us know! Sadly reformulated for worse. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1607250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1607250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1607026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520160">Sushii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-21">06/21/22 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When comes to aquatics both in and out of this price range honestly to me this is a 3.75/5. It may be just for me but this fragrance is pretty synthetic whilst the opening is very pleasing the dry dow is fairly meh. It's a bit too woody and it kind of ruins the vibe of the cologne. I wouldn't recommend buying it unless you have smelled it and liked it. Alternatives that i think are better for both in and out of this price range are Nautica voyage, ADG EDP, Profondo, Missoni Wave, Azzaro Chrome, and Luna Rossa Ocean. Longevity is decent I notice it for u to 5 hrs on my skin more or less on others but it's not terrible. The scent is just kind of average, nice, but there is better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1588721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1588721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1577906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1577906" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DustyMemphis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228928.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DustyMemphis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Chameau/Arabia-Al-Oud-83586.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83586.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Arabia Al Oud"title="Arabia Al Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1577906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1577906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228928">DustyMemphis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-04">06/04/22 16:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@chesterthejester, lol hate to break it to you, but THAT is exactly why it gives different scents on people with bad chemistry, would you like it if the same drink or food tasted different everytime?! And no, it does NOT defeat what a scent does, as if you spray on for instance a t-shirt, which is typically thin material, it slowly seeps through, causing the effect wanted, without the issue of longevity, or horribly mixed body chemistry!!!<br />
<br />
It is not the BODY temperature that unleashes the true potential, it's your surroundings, as you mention yourself ;) I mean, take a walk in the woods, walk into a flower store, what you smell has nothing to do with it being on a body...<br />
<br />
Also, pulse points is a myth, it doesn't alter temperatures compared to the rest of the body... The myth about spraying on pulse points, was when men were gentlemen, giving women kisses on the cheeks, so the scent came from behind their jaws, or kissing their hands, as they've sprayed their wrists... It's nothing but myths though, when it comes to a scent developing more on those points, it's just one of those things that keeps living on, because people keep talking about it, kinda like when people are saying that fat is bad for you, or carbs are good!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1577906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1577906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chesterthejester"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chesterthejester" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509255">chesterthejester</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@DustyMemphis the idea is to have the scent stay which is why people need to learn to spray on their clothes instead of skin??? That's just wrong in so many ways. While yes, spraying clothing will make a scent last a little longer, but it defeats the the other idk...95% of what a cologne/perfume does. And that is to change and mix with your body chemistry! That does not and will not happen on clothes. If you have a problem with it lasting on skin then you need to look at your skin, It is most likely dried out which cause the alcohol to evaporate quicker and taking the scent with it. Use unscented lotion on your pulse points and where you're gonna spray so your skin is nice and hydrated. Then as the cologne goes through the top notes and middle notes and base, it will mix with your body chemistry truly unleashing the potential in the scent.  This is also why we spray on pulse points because fragrances react to heat. Also another reason why wearing a good summer fragrance outside in the sun will radiate with goodness!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1570459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1570459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512722" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TaxMania"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TaxMania" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport"title="Allure Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324342">TaxMania</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-26">02/26/22 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it more than a lot of aquatics, because it eschews the salty and metallic notes for more of a green backdrop. Unlike flankers that are related to the OG in name only, you can definitely tell this is in the Eternity line. Which may be a good thing to you or not. I think if you like Eternity and want to continue that style into summer, this is your inexpensive ticket to do that. Performance, as stated by others, is below average.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1512722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1512722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Black pepper and a nasty chlorine type chemical smell. I use this as toilet freshener.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1512681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1512681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spendthrift"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412969"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spendthrift" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412969">Spendthrift</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very similar to Polo Blue as everyone says. <br />
Not the same though, and if PBs up your street theres no reason not to own both.<br />
Aqua I find very slightly heavier and quite a lot longer lasting. That alone makes it better value. Often I get a whole working day out of it. <br />
The plumb and lotus really shine on this one for me. The note it shares with Polo Blue, cucumber, is fleeting. <br />
It has that slight touch of old school soap that tends to be standard with all Eternitys Ive smelled.<br />
Quite thin on the ground now, so if you come across it, I recommend you pick it up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1511242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1511242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1489488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1489488" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceNut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448577"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448577.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceNut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1489488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1489488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448577">FragranceNut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-23">01/23/22 17:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TLDR: This scent is more suited for men above the age of 25, it is a outdated smelling scent. <br />
<br />
Opening: It is creamy on opening with large amounts of synthetic floral and aquatic notes. Very fresh smelling, similar to a lavender Lysol spray. The separation of notes is poor, to my nose I can only pick out two or three of the listed notes.<br />
<br />
Drydown: Upon drydown it warms up a bit with a soapy dryer sheet type of vibe. Longevity is poor while projection is strong for the first hour. Grassy notes come forward a bit during the drydown. Lasts about 4 hours total on my skin, the strong projection combined with the synthetic smell is a bit nauseating. It smells like something my grandmother might wear.<br />
<br />
In conclusion there are better aquatic/fresh fragrances out there, for the price paid ($34) it is not worth the money. A better "fresh" fragrance at a cheaper price would be Midnight Voyage by Nautica or Versace Eau Fraiche for a bit more money, both smell more modern and higher quality.<br />
<br />
Score: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1489488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1489488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1454958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1454958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xMaxdMx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345555"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345555.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xMaxdMx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1454958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1454958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1428684" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ggrisu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ggrisu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Mr-Burberry-Indigo-49095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mr. Burberry Indigo"title="Mr. Burberry Indigo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1428684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1428684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167594">Ggrisu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-15">10/15/21 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fresh blue/aqua fragrance.<br />
So far this is the best Eternity and maybe the best of all CK fragrances.<br />
Safe choise for any situations during the day.<br />
However, too boring for the night.<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1428684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1428684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1424284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1424284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="8B1M3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="8B1M3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Blue-Iconic-78475.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78475.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Blue Iconic"title="Club de Nuit Blue Iconic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1424284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1424284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254489">8B1M3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-07">10/07/21 18:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best aquatic fragrances on the market these days. Decent longevity and a nice shower-gel odor with a musky background fit for a gym session, going to bed, cruising in your home or just pulling-off your daily errands. Great if you're into smelling relatively neutral say a simple, clean soap bar that's not overbearing. Superb value given the low-price tag. On the negative side, Eternity Aqua for Men lacks character and will probably go unnoticed; don't socialize or go out clubbing with this stuff, you'll disappoint anyone you meet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1424284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1424284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1415831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1363626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="volante5767"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1145349.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="volante5767" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1363626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1363626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145349">volante5767</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-21">06/21/21 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice refreshing Summer fragrance, smells beautiful. However, I would never buy it again because it lasts for 2 hours max then becomes a skin scent, spillage and projection are very weak. I've hear many people comparing this to Polo Blue, I personally think this isn't anywhere near quality/ class of Polo Blue. I wanted a half decent Summer  cheapie, I should have gone with Chrome Aqua.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1363626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1363626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356036" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sunaidk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sunaidk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331351">Sunaidk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-07">06/07/21 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a good perfume for summer days. Fresh and fruity smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1356036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1356036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1352720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1352720" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sam_NY_89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sam_NY_89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1352720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1352720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324056">Sam_NY_89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-01">06/01/21 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity Aqua is a fresh glass of refreshing beverage in a hot summer day. It is a prescription to fight the effect of high temperature on your body and mind. Go grab one now you'll never regret it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1352720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1352720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1344523" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1344523" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="binbabalu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265756.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="binbabalu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Pour-Homme-Parfum-71378.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71378.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"title="Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1344523ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1344523" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265756">binbabalu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-16">05/16/21 21:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are looking for an easy reach that works in any situation, especially in summer, casual, office etc....and want something less than $30.....Hard to beat Eternity Aqua for a light blue scent with the ADG vibe, and performance is much better than expected. I get a full day out of this, 4 sprays, and it's good from opening to dry down. Opening cucumber is mixed right, not too much, and just a touch of spice to give it some character. One of the better light blue clean and fresh scents, nothing ground breaking, but it works and will be enjoyed by anyone around you.   I feel this is more similar to ADG than Polo Blue, but I can see why some people get the same vibe, it's similar...Similar to dozens of aquatic scents, but is a bit unique and not worn by alot of people....This is a sleeper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I understand it is a cheapie, but I think Acqua di Gio lasts longer, which is pretty pitiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1333312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1333312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1332406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1332406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Candyandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1222545.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Candyandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1332406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1332406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222545">Candyandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-26">04/26/21 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not that similar to RL Polo Blue as the other reviews here would have you believe.<br />
They are in the same ballpark, both are fresh, aquatic, very early 2000s, kind of generic scents. But Eternity Aqua has a very prominent spicy plum note that is always present and you won't find it in Polo Blue. I don't think smelling one of these fragrances gives you that good of an idea what the other is like.<br />
Don't get me wrong! I enjoy both of them for different reasons, but they just don't feel that similar to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1332406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1332406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1327142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227561">Jtonmobile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-17">04/17/21 09:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great clean masculant scent. It is a clean, soapy, fresh spicy, aquatic scent for the spring and summer. It is excellent for the price. I really like this as a casual wear, for the office, or a daily for the year. A scent that will make people be pleased to smell you.<br />
<br />
Longetivity: 82/100<br />
<br />
Projectivity: 80/100<br />
<br />
The scent: 86/100<br />
<br />
0verall: 83/100</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1327142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1327142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1318969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812">Bfish88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-03">04/03/21 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Polo blue at a fraction of the cost. Moderate Everything in scent and performance. Not bad but just an ok dumb reach freshie. Nice sharp aquatic scent with some roundness with the cucumber, thank goodness not too much cucumber. If you need to run errands in the spring or summer this will do as a casual scent. I got a 3.4oz tester for $16 so it was worth it. <br />
<br />
7/10 overall</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1318969"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1318969#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1294914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1294914" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cajunscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cajunscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vince-Camuto/Vince-Camuto-Homme-Intenso-70549.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70549.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vince Camuto Homme Intenso"title="Vince Camuto Homme Intenso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1294914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1294914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197254">Cajunscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-18">02/18/21 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pleasant and soapy smooth with a slight green edge to it. The cucumber and lavender work great together in Eternity Aqua. Similar but not extremely close to Polo Blue EDT, this is smoother and more (not overly) soapy. One spray behind each ear and one on the back of my neck and I'm still smelling myself 7 hours later when moving around in air conditioned building. If you are indoors this is a year round daytime scent. Spent $22 for a 100ml and for that price range I'd have to give it a 8.5/10 overall. You won't smell special but you'll smell very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1294914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1294914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1287815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1287815" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="surplus hominid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298888"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298888.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="surplus hominid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1287815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1287815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298888">surplus hominid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-05">02/05/21 21:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I grew up wearing Eternity and I picked this up when it was introduced. I confess it's a sentimental keepsake for me. It's easy to wear, very inexpensive, it's nicely blended, and it's a compliment getter with good or better projection. It isn't as complex as niche or some more daring designers but it works well for a refreshing easy going attractive summer scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1287815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1287815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1278923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125600">Raysmooth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-20">01/20/21 09:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked up a 200ml bottle of this for 31 bucks and I must say that this fragrance is amazing,it smells like 20% polo blue 75% acqua di gio 5% plum and lavender,imho this smells better than them all and the longevity is about 7 hours and great projection,the only thing i hate about this frag is that its super underrated and that I didn't find it sooner.......peace</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1277617" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="johnjubal1958"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="johnjubal1958" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Joop/Joop-Homme-Ice-60848.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60848.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Joop!
