Longevity is not bad as I get 5hrs+ and the projection is about 45ft. The smell is very pleasant and enjoyable. 7 out 10 for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1277617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1277617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="non.operational"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="non.operational" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfred-Dunhill/Century-50652.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50652.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Century"title="Century"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256705">non.operational</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-14">01/14/21 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this unassuming little fragrance.<br />
<br />
For me it manages to be both inoffensive and interesting, and it's proved to be useful in lots of different situations; principally as a safe, clean work scent and as a relaxing before-bed lavender scent. I initially bought it for the cucumber note, which I love, but I'd say that all of the top and mid notes are detectable, and enjoyable. <br />
<br />
People have already highlighted the key characteristics - airy, salty, clean, casual. It has a green side as well as a musky side, and also a slight beachy aspect, like sun-bleached driftwood. Really impressive for 20/100ml.<br />
<br />
EDIT: The dry down is also really good. Musk is there, and there is a faint version of Guaiac wood, coming across as more of a bleached, sandy driftwood. Totally casual and laid back.<br />
<br />
2nd Update: Having put this away for a couple of years, I've worn it this week in sunny, 28 degree heat. In that setting it's an absolute banger. Like being splashed with azure, salty water, then settles down to musk with hinds of plum. So good in the heat!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1275811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1275811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1273402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1273402" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adamh9201"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257018"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="adamh9201" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1273402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1273402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257018">adamh9201</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-09">01/09/21 19:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>THE GOOD: aquatic, light, masculine. Will not offend anyone <br />
THE BAD: kind of an old man type of scent to my nose <br />
RATING: 7/10<br />
BLIND BUY: yes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1273402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1273402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1260402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1260402" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abahvdbs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1176068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abahvdbs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Asad-72821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Asad"title="Asad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1260402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1260402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176068">abahvdbs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-13">12/13/20 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>CK Eternity Aqua is a SWEET-FLORAL-SOAPY-AQUATIC<br />
<br />
Starts out moderately sweet and floral almost perfumish (like the og CK Eternity), then a salty marine accord is added in along with some light soapyness (soapy like the og CK Eternity, just not as bold); once it dries the sweetness and floralness turns down some (but is still noticeable), the light soapyness it still there but the saltiness becomes faint as clean and airy light musk comes in, the dry smells very similar to CK Eternity Air just airy and clean;  It's a tad sweet and a bit floral but it's a good clean smelling mass appealing fragrance.  People are saying it's similar to Polo Blue... I'd say Polo Blue is more masculine, less sweet, and more blue-aquatic. To me CK Eternity Aqua smells similar to Lacoste L.12.12 Bleu Powerful, both are sweet-floral aquatics, however, Eternity Aqua is more mature and marine-salty aquatic while L.12.12 Bleu Powerful is more youthful sweet blue/bleu-sport-aquatic.<br />
<br />
Projection/Sillage: GOOD, not a 'beast mode' projection monster but is very aromatic w/ good 'scent bubble' for about 3-4 hours that radiates within 7 feet<br />
<br />
Performance/Longevity: GOOD, will last on avg about 7-8 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1260402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1260402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1260362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1260362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rick1098"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rick1098" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Trussardi/Riflesso-46287.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46287.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Riflesso"title="Riflesso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1260362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1260362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257757">rick1098</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-12">12/12/20 23:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I kind of see the similarities to Polo Blue but this fragrance isnt as boring. Its a nice aquatic, airy, salty fragrance. Cucumber is very noticeable and lovely, and the green notes and lavender mix very well.  Smells very nice and clean for the hot months. I'd rotate this out with my other aquatics in the summer no doubt. Its not the most unique smell in the book but youd be hard pressed to find someone say they dont like it. Easy to go nose blind to though<br />
<br />
Scent: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
Projection: 5/10<br />
Versatility: 7/10 Any time during warmer months<br />
Price Value: 8.5/10 Can be had cheap, superior to what it clones<br />
Overall: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1260362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1260362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1257925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1257925" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dajc26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1185757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dajc26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Reyane-Tradition/Insurrection-20309.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20309.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Insurrection"title="Insurrection"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1257925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1257925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185757">dajc26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-07">12/07/20 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are a time and a place for almost every type of fragrance, and this is the simple, relaxing, fresh, enjoyable, none offensive, and none artistic type of everyday scent.  Polo Blue vibe at a fraction of the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1257925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1257925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1254965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1254253" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tegard Lewis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1271774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tegard Lewis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1254253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1254253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271774">Tegard Lewis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-28">11/28/20 23:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first time I smelled this fragrance it was too salty/stenchy, I don't really know the word for it, but it was quite unpleasant for me to smell, but as I try it more it kind of grows into me, I started to notice the freshness and I like it.<br />
<br />
It's fresh and calming, good scent to wear during the daytime, in the office, school, or just casual activities during a quite hot daytime, nothing outstanding but it does its job.<br />
<br />
Sillage is average in my opinion, not too striking on the nose but not too subtle as well, for the longevity it's kind of weak to moderate.<br />
<br />
7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1254253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1254253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1238524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Just saying I am very disappointed ,WHY does everything good never last? Why mess with a great daytime casual frag?  Greed that's why!  :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1185006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1185006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1175216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1175216" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucky lefty 00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233467.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucky lefty 00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-11784.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11784.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend"title="Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1175216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1175216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); I paid $33 cad for a 50 ml.  <br />
<br />
And I get 15-20 mins (2 sprays) before it's a skin scent.<br />
<br />
Maybe I need to spray 5+ <br />
But even then not worth it for me personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1175216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1175216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1146100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1146100" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="trmjkd989"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/421715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.421715.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="trmjkd989" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1146100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1146100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/421715">trmjkd989</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-16">02/16/20 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up with a watery surge of cucumber, lotus, and green notes. As it dries down on my skin, the pepper starts to stand out with some faint woods in the background.<br />
<br />
I'm not sure how I feel about the pepper in this fragrance. It kind of clashes with the smooth/watery vibe that the majority of this fragrance is centered around. <br />
<br />
It's not too bad. I enjoy the opening a lot. It doesn't last too long though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1146100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1146100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1127562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
It s like other common fresh fragrance group.Eg.Polo blue, Aqua di GIO GiorgioArmani.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1127557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1127557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1123959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1123959" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Al-Dukhan-70979.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70979.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al-Dukhan"title="Al-Dukhan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1123959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1123959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-12">12/12/19 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quite possibly one of the best affordable freshies out there. It's really nothing like the Polo, this is a soft elegant fresh aquatic that projects moderate and performs for about 4 hours. For the price, it is absolutely acceptable. I have a vintage bottle from 10 years ago, not sure if there's any difference in the scent itself nowadays, but I enjoy it non the less. It's very clean and fresh. Nothing to complain about here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1123959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1123959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1123683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1123683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="misforwhat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1217882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="misforwhat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Carbon-43402.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43402.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Carbon"title="Luna Rossa Carbon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1123683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1123683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217882">misforwhat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-11">12/11/19 11:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad for hot, humid summers. This is what I wear when this get warm and muggy and I just want to smell fresh around the house or outdoors (think late-night 4th of July fireworks with the family). This is a classic crowd pleaser and gets compliments as much as more expensive scents do at other times of the year.<br />
<br />
In the office, however, I find this to be rather forgettable (the strongest note is cucumber, after all). Anywhere you have dry, climate-controlled air you'll get nothing but top notes. Thus the scent doesn't come across as complex or interesting as others I have tried.<br />
<br />
The best thing I like about Eternity Aqua is how fresh and natural it smells. You can use this for just about any situation if you wanted, I just think there are much better options for signature scents. For me this is a niche summer scent for chilling at home or with friends and family. For work, nights out, and cold weather I would have others to choose from.<br />
<br />
Overall: recommended if you want to smell like you spent the day at a spa and want to blend in, not stand out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1123683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1123683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1107537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171344">Smellwise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-12">08/12/19 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fresh and uplifting cucumber and some citrus on the top.. i cant say i smell the spices.. if its there its very faint.. it smells like nautica voyage the most.. i dont think this smells like polo blue.. polo blue is more spicy to me.. moderate performance all around.. not a bad scent.. good for very hot weather to freshen you up.. i prefer nautica voyage over this one.. to me voyage has more sparkle and the drydown has prominent musk that i kinda like.. both are cheap and smell synthetic but very nice indeed..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1087139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1087139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1083213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1083213" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PontifexMaximus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/922344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.922344.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PontifexMaximus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diesel/Fuel-For-Life-Spirit-17821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fuel For Life Spirit"title="Fuel For Life Spirit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1083213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1083213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/922344">PontifexMaximus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-30">07/30/19 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clearly derivative of Polo Blue, Eternity Aqua manages to be a funner and more enjoyable wear on my skin, pushing the cucumber note so essential to Southeast Asian sensibilities of refreshment and cooling.  Aqua performs well, smells like the Gulf coast beaches of Sarasota and Bradenton with a dose of fresh sliced cucumber in a glass of fizzy Sprite, and makes for an interesting balance of citrus, green and aquatic.  While performance isn't remarkable, moderate in both sillage and longevity, I reach for this far more frequently than Polo Blue because it's less perfume like in its overall accord and wears more naturally with more quality than one would assume.  A very good bargain fragrance that works effectively as a summer staple and signature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1083213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1083213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1077637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1077637" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Savatage79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1185947.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Savatage79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-Parfum-75183.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75183.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled Parfum"title="Boss Bottled Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1077637ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1077637" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); Gorgeous scent start to finish, cool, refreshing, summery, watery, everything that makes for a great summer frag. Lifting, hanging by the pool, running errands, just great for any and all casual situations</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1077637"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1077637#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1075495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1198998">amosfiocchi70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-03">07/03/19 11:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Underrated fragrance that has depth. Definitely put cucumber on my radar. Wife loves it on me. Signature scent for the longest time. Powerhouse for sillage and longevity. If sprayed too aggressively can fill a room. Closest I have smelled to it is D&amp;G light blue pour Homme. Light Blue just doesnt have the bite/freshness of the cucumber. Both drydowns are almost identical on my skin. For me, backup bottle worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1075495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1075495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1069579" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It should be called CK makes watered down ADG. Glad I didnt buy a full size bottle of this. I bought the 1 oz. for around $10 on eBay. I remember liking one of these Eternity flankers when I tried it at Macys. Must have been Eternity Air. Oh well. I was looking for some summer/aquatic frags. This was a semi blind miss. But for $10 bucks it was ok.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1069579"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1069579#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1066555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Slightly fresher with 7-8 hours longevity. A great gym or errand running fragrance for a Man not a Boy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1066555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1066555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1064280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am more into aquatic and woody oriental scents but I like this one. The lavender opening is unmistakable and it is not offensive nor synthetic. Has also one of the great and memorable drydowns. Easily earns 8 out of 10 rating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1064280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1064280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1060150" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; At least every time I had it on. I guess thats what marine fragrances do. I wore it both on hot and cold days and it was lovely and I had awesome compliments too. Someone walked up to me saying,I can guess what you are having on, INVICTUS. This is was way back in 2014, so I guess the batches of the Invictus smelled similar at the time. <br />
<br />
I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1028839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1028839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1000932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1000932" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brother Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1163370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brother Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1000932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1000932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163370">Brother Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-14">11/14/18 18:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed this on at the department store and literally walked 40 feet and was approached by a woman who politely asked, "What the hell are you wearing?!!" I was shocked and a bit embarrassed, because I thought that my sense of smell had failed me and that I had sprayed on a "stinker." However, she went on to tell me, "I want MY man to smell like THAT!!!" Long story short...a better version of Polo Blue that smoothly fades into an interesting-but-unavailable version of Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gi. VERY NICE, especially for the $20 bucks that I paid for it. It stayed strong on my skin for about 4 1/2 hours. It's probably a monster on clothing. Spring and Summer only with this one, guys. It fits those seasons perfectly.<br />
<br />
BEWARE: As I said before...I got only 40 FEET away from the tester and a pretty, young thing approached me without hesitation. I'm quite sure you get the picture.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1000932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1000932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent992747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I paid 25 for 100ml</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="991710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=991710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent961386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc961386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RUDOLFO512"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/41596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.41596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RUDOLFO512" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Chergui-2762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chergui"title="Chergui"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma961386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd961386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/41596">RUDOLFO512</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-13">07/13/18 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity Aqua is a very fresh fragrance. Fruity and citrus with a touch of aquatic. I just discovered it in 2018 and I love it. Perfect for the summer months. Lasts a long time on me. I'm glad I purchased it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="961386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=961386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent955083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc955083" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndySmellsGreat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndySmellsGreat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Apex-72723.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72723.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apex"title="Apex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma955083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd955083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379">AndySmellsGreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-23">06/23/18 05:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Awesome punchy EDT.<br />
<br />
I forgot I had this - I had a small bottle in my car arm rest for emergencies. I put it on in the dark and had to remind myself what this was.<br />
<br />
Better than average budget Aquatic Ozonic - most reviews here are spot on.<br />
<br />
A relief as the Plum and Cucumber punch strongly through for a fair bit making a change from the usual dominant citrus blends. Ozonic and a bit green - a bit salty. The pyramid here is somewhat fair.<br />
<br />
Disagree with poor silage comments - if you think this doesn't project something is wrong - with decent 4 hours or so longevity.<br />
<br />
I also own Eternity which is fairly safe - this is genuine flanker that has enough spin to justify keeping it next to the original as well for a hotter day! I also have no problem switching this between my Green Irish Tweed or say my Bulgari Aqua or Aqua Marine Tonique.<br />
<br />
Again, fairly smooth for the price, if it is about budget or freshness for a change you won't regret this even as a blind buy.<br />
<br />
Happy Smelling</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="955083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=955083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent939893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc939893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShiveringTimber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/884106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShiveringTimber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma939893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd939893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/884106">ShiveringTimber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-06">05/06/18 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A small 0.5 ounce bottle of this came with a 3.4 ounce of original Eternity. I was just testing it out and didn't like the open at all. I'm not for sure I like the smell of cucumbers unless eating them. The strange thing for me is I love the Acqua di Gio line, especially Essenza, Profumo and the basic version. This Eternity Aqua takes on a very similar scent during drydown as those AdG do. I keep smelling jasmine but there's no jasmine listed. I only notice it because I wear the AdGs a lot in spring so either I have AdG seeping from my pores or something in this creates a jasmine scent. It's not bad at all. Doesn't smell as refined as the AdG jasmine but it would be a good spring/summer scent for those looking for a cheaper alternative to AdG.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="939893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=939893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent918185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc918185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tayyabforyouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1124219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tayyabforyouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Club-31424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Club"title="Colonia Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma918185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd918185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219">tayyabforyouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-04">03/04/18 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts off smelling extremely similar to Polo Blue, with very prominent cucumber along with a bit of citrus. This fragrance leans very masculine. About 30 minutes in, it enters the drydown and becomes a spicy cucumber (the spice here being schezuan pepper), however the opening lasts much longer if sprayed on clothes. The drydown then ends up smelling like plums and schezuan pepper along with mild notes of citrus. The cucumber has totally disappeared at this point. It's a pleasant scent and very spicy. It smells like I have some good-smelling hot sauce on my body - as weird as that sounds, it smells pretty nice; this is due to the heavy shezuan pepper note which is perfectly blended with the plum note. Basenotes smell similar to the drydown. Sillage is moderate but leaning strong - I can still smell wafts of it hours after spraying - and longevity is also moderate at about 4-5 hours. Overall it's an interesting and pleasant fragrance, though I wish the cucumber note lasted longer and I think the shizuan pepper note is a bit strange in a fresh fragrance, while plum note though rare isn't the most appealing to me. Ultimately decided I didn't like it because the pepper is so realistic it feels like I have hot sauce on my skin - though some will enjoy that (kind of like the opposite of the cooling sensation of mint).<br />
 <br />
3.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="918185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=918185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent906820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
