padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1116554">the_keen_edge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-23">01/23/18 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not ground breaking, but it's a very pleasant, fresh, safe, somewhat generic summertime aquatic. I like wearing this one while I'm kicking back on the patio, and enjoying a few cold ones with friend's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="903868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=903868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent887980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc887980" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fisken23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/54289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.54289.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fisken23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tommy-Hilfiger/Tommy-Now-51929.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51929.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tommy Now"title="Tommy Now"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma887980ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd887980" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/54289">fisken23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-08">12/08/17 01:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update 2017-12-22 Performe really well, even in the winter. +8 hours now and counting. It stays fresh through the whole day. Thumbs up!<br />
<br />
Superfresh cucumbery and watery fragrance. Much better and juicier than Polo Blue, in my opinion. Also better longevity. Spring/summer in a bottle! Or just to smell good at the office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="887980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=887980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent880549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc880549" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="francois81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/790157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.790157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="francois81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-for-Men-1115.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1115.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit for Men"title="Burberry Brit for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma880549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd880549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/790157">francois81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-15">11/15/17 02:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Typical summer/aquatic scent: fresh, pleasant, watery . In the first 30 minutes. Then comes the nothing, only the soapy-watery notes. And it has the same problem as most of the summer scent: terrible sillage, with poor longevity. If you overdose the fragrance (6-8 sprays in every 2-3 hours), it will be great, but if you use only 3-4 sprays the scent will dissapear in the summer heat 1 hours later The top note is the best part of the scent. I can sniff some citruses and cucumber (mixed with calone). Because of the cucumber the top smells similar than Ralph Lauren Polo Blue. In the mid I can smell a little bit of pepper with lavender, and the weak base contains some patchouli and sandalwood. After the drydown you really feel, the hard soapy-watery notes, but unfortunately, I dont want to smell like soapy water. The perfume is a little bit unique with the cucumber note, but nothing special, not worth the money<br />
<br />
- Typical summer, daytime scent<br />
<br />
- The sillage is under the average, longevity is maybe around 4-5 hours<br />
<br />
- Safe blind buy<br />
<br />
Scent (open, top-mid): 7/10 (x2)<br />
Scent (drydown, base): 5/10 (x2)<br />
Sillage: 4/10<br />
Longevity: 4.5/10<br />
Uniqueness: 7/10<br />
Versatility: 6/10<br />
<br />
Total: 5.688/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="880549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=880549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent867145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc867145" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryanmmas26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.761961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryanmmas26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Le-Parfum-91693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma867145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd867145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961">Ryanmmas26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-03">10/03/17 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great scent at a great price point !<br />
<br />
Eternity aqua is a fresh out of the shower smell that's a green smelling aquatic that's very light,airy and refreshing but in the base it does has some depth with the sandalwood and musk. This is a great casual scent for the warmer temperature and is also office friendly as long as you don't go over 5 sprays as this can get cloying although it smells very light.<br />
<br />
A lot of people complain about performance issues but on me this has great performance as the first hour and a half I get very good projection and then for the duration of the scent you get a nice scent bubble but the best thing about the performance is that this leaves a nice sillage trail. Longevity on me is 5-8 hours !<br />
<br />
Scents that this is very similar to are Polo Blue,Cool Water and sometimes there's notes that come out that slightly remind me of Just me by Paris Hilton which is an ADG clone. Also this does smell kind of similar to the original eternity but only once you get to the drydown does it show similarities. But if you hated the original I would say to still give this a shot because there not all that similar <br />
<br />
Overall rating---7.5 out of 10 ! I think this is a great scent for the summer and 1 that will get you a few compliments</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="867145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=867145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent863650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863650" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="giants2010ws"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1081494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="giants2010ws" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Chrome-788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chrome"title="Chrome"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081494">giants2010ws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-22">09/22/17 14:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells so much like the Eternity Summer from 2005 or 2006 it is very fresh, sweet, and aquatic but unfortunately it doesn't last that long, I still like it a lot though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="863650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=863650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent858941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc858941" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Forget Freeman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/933854"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.933854.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Forget Freeman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/Marlborough-Cologne-5005.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5005.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marlborough Cologne"title="Marlborough Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma858941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd858941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/933854">Forget Freeman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-07">09/07/17 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity Aqua is a "safe-bet" fragrance. I'd say you'd be hard pushed to find anyone that finds it offensive. <br />
<br />
Fresh and mild, has a salty ocean vibe that makes it good for summer or stuffy environments (such as offices etc). <br />
<br />
As pleasant as it is personally i find it has a lack of character, a lot of aquatics smell similar to this. clearly a decision was made in Aqua's conception and marketing to be as far-reaching and appealing as possible.  <br />
<br />
If found on offer it might be worth a punt, to use a musicians terminology it's a crowdpleaser, something everyone has come across before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="858941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=858941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent857407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Weak in the longevity category but smells very nice.  Not enough of a soapy clean sent to wear to the gym, more for running errands in shorts or even lounging at home.  Reminds me a lot of the original Eternity For Men.  If you like the original, you'll probably like this aquatic fresh version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="828027"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=828027#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent823561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To be honest, I never smelled it after putting it on.  It immediately became a skin scent and I could smell it faintly on my skin but no projection or sillage at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="813965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=813965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent812537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc812537" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SajidBeg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1037974.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SajidBeg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/MAIOS/WHIMS-76568.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76568.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="WHIMS"title="WHIMS"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma812537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd812537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037974">SajidBeg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-14">04/14/17 07:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply an awesome fragrance! Clean, fresh and aquatic startup through with cucumber, citruses and lavender presents it pretty alluring. Dry down is full of calm when musk and sandalwood are elevated. Safe fragrance to wear in office; has longevity of office-timing (8Hrs). It's compliments getter and best deal for daily use in summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="812537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=812537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent797960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I Love the drydown... Very fresh and warm at the same time, like a summer night by the beach,laundry softener smell, but i can't stand the initial blast, reminds me of Donna Karan Delicious Red.. I sense a coffe note in it. Also it's sharp at the first hour. <br />
I like, but only if i can skip the top notes :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="797960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=797960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent791586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc791586" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mkpunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mkpunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Dua-Brand/Gone-Swimming-in-Electrique-85505.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85505.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gone Swimming in lectrique"title="Gone Swimming in lectrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma791586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd791586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001800">mkpunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-10">02/10/17 21:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is virtually Polo Blue. Eternity Aqua just has the rare plum note and a bit of spice from the pepper note. I understand fragrances do smell alike but this is if not making a similar fragrance to Polo Blue, it is an attempt at cloning the fragrance. If you have Polo Blue, this is a redundant purchase. If not, and you like semi-aquatic scents, this isn't a bad pick. I just know for me that until I am out on Polo Blue, this is a fragrance I have no reason to get.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="791586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=791586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent767051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Worth the buy to have for a day you just want to throw something on, but, not something that I think is a "must run out" for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="712968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=712968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent712111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="712111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=712111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent708137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000867">ChrisSmellsGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-23">05/23/16 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice fragrance...very fresh and pleasant.  But there's really nothing special about it.  Its one of those "smelled it before" type fragrances.  It reminds me of the fragrance section of a department store. For me this has basically become my cologne to waste when i need to quickly run some errands and Im not so fresh and need an Italian shower. (Im italian so i can say that LOL)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="708137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=708137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent704608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
The most beautiful thing about this fragrance is that ladies do give compliments whenever I wear it, It makes me feel more confident on a date :D <br />
<br />
Regards<br />
Kapil</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="704608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=704608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent694179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc694179" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oldspice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/584303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.584303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oldspice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Untold-78476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Untold"title="Club de Nuit Untold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma694179ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd694179" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/584303">Oldspice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-07">04/07/16 01:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I probably would have never tried Eternity Aqua but at an airport I saw a gentleman next to me going through security pull a mini bottle of it out while emptying his pockets.  He smelled nice so I gave it a shot.<br />
<br />
It is a bit similar to Polo Blue to me but not quite.  It has a cooler feel to it than most aquatics.  I think that's the cucumber note though it doesn't smell quite like cucumber to me.  It's nice.  I get better longevity with this than Polo Blue and some other aquatics, get 6-8 hours it.<br />
<br />
The wife who only enjoys fresh scents has commented positively when I wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="694179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=694179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent693717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc693717" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bluedad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/723236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.723236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bluedad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma693717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd693717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/723236">bluedad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-04-05">04/05/16 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had it yesterday. It has very good smell. But i don't like sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="693717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=693717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent691130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc691130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryanmmas26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.761961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryanmmas26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Le-Parfum-91693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma691130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd691130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961">Ryanmmas26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-28">03/28/16 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After spending more time with this fragrance I really have come to appreciate this !<br />
<br />
The opening is very reminiscent of Polo Blue as it has a very crisp,cucumber,somewhat sharp, opening with black pepper in the background.<br />
<br />
Even though the opening is great it does smooth out in the mid and in the mid is where this does have some similarites with the original eternity. The reason this has similarites is that it does start to go from being Polo Blue into smelling like a outdoorsy/green scented laudry sheet type of smell. (Actually when I wore this I was getting confused to what the smell around me was because when I put my clothes in the dryer I did use  green/outdoorsy dryer sheets and didnt know if it was the dryer sheet smell or the cologne) But sure enough 4 hours later I smelled my arm and yes it was the cologne !!!<br />
<br />
My girlfriend did NOT like this when I 1st sprayed it and even she thought it was Polo Blue(She thinks Polo Blue smells like nasty old spice,lol) but 1 hour later she said I changed my mind and I really like that 1 !!!<br />
 And for her thats awesome because she hates most of my frags !<br />
<br />
Performance on this is great but also deceiving ! This lasts anywhere from 6-10 hours and projects great. One thing to be cautious of is that this is a scent that you will become nose blind too and even when you think the scent is gone others around you will still smell this so PLEASE use this stuff with caution. 3-4 sprays MAX as anymore than that and it starts to become cloying.<br />
<br />
Overall rating im staying solid at an 8 out of 10 ! Great scent thats great for everyday use and this stuff has great performance as well which is rare for a freshie</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="691130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=691130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent690277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc690277" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryanmmas26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.761961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryanmmas26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Le-Parfum-91693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma690277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd690277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/761961">Ryanmmas26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-25">03/25/16 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First initial review:<br />
<br />
To me this smells like a BETTER version of Polo Blue. Polo Blue was a great scent but I always wish the cucumber note was more pronouced as it gave the scent a refreshing quality and I also wished it didnt have as much spice as it kind of made Polo Blue a little lackluster. (still a good scent though)<br />
<br />
This scent though is a big step up though as the cucumber is a lot more crisp and pronounced giving this scent a very refreshing quality and then once this dries down it becomes a little more warm as the lavender and green notes kick in but throughout the life of the fragrance it still keeps that freshness from the cucumber unlike in Polo Blue where you get an amazing opening but then shortly in the heart it becomes really muddy and dull smelling.<br />
<br />
Performance on this is great for a fresh scent ! This projects really well and lasts 6-8 hours !<br />
<br />
Id have to rate this an 8 out of 10 upon the first wearing ! I may rate this higher when i wear it more and I can see this being a staple in my freshie/summer/spring rotation</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="690277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=690277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent689438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc689438" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mustafa76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/919746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.919746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mustafa76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Royal-Aoud-3675.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3675.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Aoud"title="Royal Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma689438ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd689438" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/919746">mustafa76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-22">03/22/16 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>                </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="689438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=689438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent685042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc685042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/298932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nautica/Nautica-2479.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2479.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nautica"title="Nautica"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma685042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd685042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/298932">cell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-08">03/08/16 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first CK fragrance and indeed it is a very well blended fragrance.<br />
<br />
When people compared this to Polo Blue, I really wanted to buy this since I lost my Polo Blue under stupid circumstances. I don't know what is it with Ralph Lauren fragrances, they are obscenely overpriced even if discounted!<br />
<br />
Yes, they are in the same vein, but compared to Polo Blue, Eternity Aqua is lighter, soapier, smoother and a tad thinner(not a bad thing). If you think about it, Polo Blue is quite strong especially with the metallic/ozonic qualities of its scent. Not so with Eternity Aqua. The ozone quality is dialed way down that not many people will find this cloying/in-your-face/offensive so this can be worn anytime be it in the office, engaging in casual activities, running errands or just hanging out.<br />
<br />
Honestly speaking, Eternity Aqua is one of those fragrances that will smell familiar to you but you can't quite put a finger. On certain stages of its lifespan, this can give vibes of: Versace Pour Homme(after about 10 minutes, I currently have this), AXE PHOENIX(had this), L.12.12 Bleu or Vert(cannot remember), Kenneth Cole Reaction and CK One Summer 2013 (who knows what else!). In short, it is not that unique.<br />
<br />
Make no mistake about it, this is a true aquatic but can easily be worn all year through since it can bring freshness when one so desires, which is really the point of using an aquatic anyway.<br />
<br />
I acquired this blindly in the hopes that this would replace my Polo Blue but, alas, scentwise they are only in the same theme. The comparison is not the same as, say, Acqua di Gio with 360 Red, which can pass for each other.<br />
<br />
On it's own it is a good cologne but I'm glad I only got the 100ml and not the 200ml. Now, the hunt is still on for a great deal on Polo Blue.<br />
<br />
Will acquire again only on a good deal since longevity and projection are sorely lacking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="685042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=685042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent681742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc681742" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chimpster7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/937917"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.937917.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chimpster7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Parfum-50757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Parfum"title="Y Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma681742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd681742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/937917">chimpster7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-27">02/27/16 00:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't get any cucumbers in the opening, or ever, as listed in the notes above. I get a kind of generic aquatic/greens blast for a good half an hour until it starts to dry down. Completely different from the original Eternity IMHO. <br />
<br />
When it starts drying down I start smelling the lotus, lavender, roses (which isn't in the listed notes so it might just be my nose) and patchouli, would have never noticed the plum if I hadn't read the note breakdown but now that I see it I can smell hints of it. Then after about 4 hours, the floral notes give way to more patchouli, woodsy notes and musk at which time it smells almost identical to POLO BLUE. At this point I feel like it's a skin scent, but then when I walk by co-workers they are apparently left smelling the wake of it.<br />
<br />
Even though its smells is reminiscent of like 100 different colognes and there's nothing really unique or special about it, the girls at my work seem to like how it smells on me. They like it waaay more than I do. And since it doesn't give me a headache I don't mind wearing it from time to time just to keep it fresh at work.<br />
<br />
 Longevity:  7/10<br />
      Sillage:  7/10<br />
Originality:  3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="681742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=681742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent679939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Everyone will enjoy this juice.  Lasts for around 1 hour.  Not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="679939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=679939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent675281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Almost third on my buy list, but I'd have to compare it to my existing summer scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="675281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=675281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent668718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nice aquatic, slightly spicy woody. It's not too much of either, it's not over the top in any way. This is my fiancs signature scent, and it's so very addictive to me. He always smells so good. I have smelt this on a few other guys and I think it's easy to pull of  och suits many. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc668208" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BigD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.983109.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BigD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma668208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd668208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); It has a hint of salty smell and reminds me a little of that clean scent from original yellow dial bars of soap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="668208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=668208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent667349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="667349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=667349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent665730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="simon.edwards"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934356"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.934356.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="simon.edwards" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Bvlgari-Man-9403.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9403.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bvlgari Man"title="Bvlgari Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934356">simon.edwards</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-10">01/10/16 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something about the Eternity frags that always has a nasty 'green' chemical dry-down to it. As far as aquatic scents go, its not bad, and does moderately in terms of projection and longevity. Its unoffensive and wearable anywhere - its just not stand-out. Then again, its not expensive. In that respect, you get what you pay for, but like I said, the dry-down leaves little to be desired.<br />
<br />
Have a great day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="665730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=665730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent655474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc655474" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nickomay30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.918594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nickomay30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Aqva-Pour-Homme-Atlantiqve-42856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqva Pour Homme Atlantiqve"title="Aqva Pour Homme Atlantiqve"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma655474ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd655474" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918594">Nickomay30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-12-09">12/09/15 15:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Believe me! "Ill bet my name on this"<br />
<br />
Nickomay30</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="655474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=655474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent630825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc630825" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tarek trabulsi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.394992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tarek trabulsi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Herms"title="Terre d'Herms"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma630825ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd630825" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394992">tarek trabulsi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-09-16">09/16/15 23:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Since i have a fairly big collection, i purchased Eternity Aqua just for collection purpose, i had no expectations. After trying it i started to like it more and more, i even liked it more than the original (which i like for its nostalgic value), even though i didn't use it that much, the higher brands like Chanel and Cartier always took an advantage over it.<br />
Recently i decided to give it a chance and use it before the summer ends, so i started wearing it to the office...it was a big surprise, i got tons of compliments, some of them were huge ones and came from unexpected people, women love it way more than expected (one asked me for a spray on her hand to keep sniffing it).<br />
I don't actually wear nor pick my fragrances to get complements or for attraction, i wear what i do enjoy and what gives me the vibe that matches my mood, but to be honest, it's always a good refreshing thing to get a nice complement,  now while I'm enjoying the uplifting refreshing almost salty feeling combined with the confidence that I'm smelling nice for people around me. <br />
What a nice surprise from a brand that i usually tend to not appreciate that much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="630825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=630825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent623042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc623042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ice and Snow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/945948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ice and Snow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma623042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd623042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/945948">Ice and Snow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-08-22">08/22/15 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont claim to know much about perfumes but I know what I like. I like winter- the harsher and more brutal the winter the happier I get. Think frozen lakes, snow storms, gnashing winds and grey clouds. The movie Tron Legacy and Snow Falling on Cedars  best epitomises the scent best associated to these bleak dramas. <br />
<br />
Think of rain, ferocious waves and fog.  That foreboding image have a scent to it- a sharp, clean icy scent. If I can add a twist to the scent- snow laced with blood and semen. <br />
<br />
So on with the review. Calvin Klein Aqua ruined my winter visage.Finally I finally came to understand that not all aquatics perfume are suitable to evoke wintry visage. This is surely the case with CK-Aqua.<br />
<br />
The top note is very brief, just three seconds of iciness before the sharp spicy woodiness takes over. The sharp spicy scent lasts a long time. I sprayed some my clothes and instead of reminding me of warmth associated with foggy New Hampshire mornings, I am thrown hurly burly into the Madrid summer night scene! It took seven hours before the spicy woodiness to abate to let the oceanic scent return (just meekly!).<br />
<br />
This is quite an inverted scent. What took front stage is the base note. Once again the spiciness turns me off, gosh it hollers- look I am sophisticated!. The heart note once again made of spicy note  is very unforgiving. Finally, many, many,many hours later, the top notes meekly announces itself- apple, citrus and cucumber. 90% base note. 9% heart note and 1% top note.<br />
<br />
By then I am so sick of being reminded of summer that I look forward to a long shower to wash off that scent. If you love summer parties of Ibiza or Tel Aviv- seen and be see crowd  this is a great scent but not suitable for the serious winter person who prefer the bleak isolation of Iceland.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="623042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=623042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent618207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/441803">said.mubarok.96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-08-05">08/05/15 02:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I Love this one, better than Azzaro chrome for me. this frag has a soft and fresh aroma. I have no sweat salty feeling in hot outdoor like when I wear chrome.<br />
love it !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="618207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=618207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent605267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
