Girlfriend loves it. Doesn't last to long but it's a light scent so that's to be expected.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="600970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=600970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent592418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc592418" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="112237"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/907796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="112237" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma592418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd592418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/907796">112237</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-05-06">05/06/15 21:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested it before making my decision, but I found it the faintest aquatic perfume I've ever smelled. It's nice though, and likeable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="592418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=592418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent589488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc589488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ddadam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/914514"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ddadam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma589488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd589488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/914514">ddadam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-04-27">04/27/15 00:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a new make of the aquatics like Polo sport, with the plum, and the new type of typical cedar woods drydown. It is a calone bomb. Your standard aquatic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="589488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=589488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent587544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc587544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="farook"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/818337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.818337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="farook" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Rochas-Man-1426.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1426.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rochas Man"title="Rochas Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma587544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd587544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/818337">farook</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-04-20">04/20/15 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just realized that this is a watered down version of one of my favorite scents of all time-PoloSport by Ralph Lauren. Aqua becomes faint after an hour, though pple close to you can smell it. I dont think I'll get a second bottle. Not worth spending more than 35 US bucks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="587544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=587544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent584830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc584830" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OCNBreeze7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/445212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.445212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OCNBreeze7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blasted-Heath-32851.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32851.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blasted Heath"title="Blasted Heath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma584830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd584830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/445212">OCNBreeze7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-04-10">04/10/15 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternitys Aqua should not be overlooked  a gem and underrated as a Spring/Summer aquatic fragrance.  This one has been on the shelf for a while and I was pleasantly surprised today  the blend of aromatic, aquatic, citrus, and woodsy notes is quite pleasing.  I had the clean and fresh type feeling all day  similar to the feeling when you wake after a storm has passed through the night and you see the sun rising in the early morning hours over the ocean.  Clean and renewed  today is going to be a good day..!! There is a remarkable similarity to Polo Blue  I think Blue may have a bit more umphh in projection, though.  Aqua is sufficiently flexible for any event, generally a crowd pleaser, and modestly priced, adding to the appeal.  If there is any criticism of Aqua, it will be in performance  I smell it most of the day, lasting solidly 4+ hours (longer on clothing), but very close to skin level.  I am a huge fan of the aquatic fragrances and endorse adding Eternitys Aqua to your collection.  Given the pricing, definitely a must for the younger, novice, or amateur collector.  Final tally for Aqua is 4.0 stars out of 5.0 stars and a solid "like" for all the "Fragrantica Following".  Enjoy your day</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="584830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=584830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent578808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wont say that it's great but I do like it. Fans of Polo Blue should like it as well. Instead of melon EA uses citruses and the cucumber is a bit lighter here than in Polo Blue. Performance is moderate which is typical but it makes a great warm weather/office scent. I cant see many folks hating this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="566848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=566848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent563630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
my vote 6,5/10<br />
<br />
non strabiliante ma neanche una schifezza.  un profumo da stagioni calde, personalmente ho percepito un qualcosa di sintetico nella fragranza, pungeva all'olfatto. ho usato dei campioncini, una volta mi incontrai con un amico che disse "oh per favore, hai messo un cavolo di profumo americano no?" la proiezione  molto forte per essere una eau de toilette estiva, non esagerare con gli spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="563630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=563630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent563535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc563535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="warrioromar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/875800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.875800.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="warrioromar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gallivant/Naples-69889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Naples"title="Naples"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma563535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd563535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/875800">warrioromar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-29">01/29/15 20:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternity Aqua is one of the nicest smelling Aquatic scent, if not the best. But just for the SMELL, It is without question THE MOST AMAZING &amp; PLEASANT SMELL FOR ME, I use this scent sometime before I go to bed So I can go to sleep with a smile and pleasant thought. But I was going to choose one aquatic for my shelf and current use, and with regret I had to choose Bvlgari Aqva, and the reason is Eternity on my skin does not project after 3/4 hours, when Bvlgari Aqva still going strong as a skin scent. but for the quality of smell, Eternity Aqua is second to none. So Eternity Aqua gets this SPECIAL LOVE from me. It might fade away quick, but when it lives, it smells AMAZING, Scent wise NOT OTHER AQUATIC I FOUND AS PERFECT, FLAWLESS AS THIS. This is just DEVINE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! YES THIS IS A SMELL TO LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! But I am unfortunate it does not last on my skin, but it does last on some peoples skin for very long time. Wish I was one of them, and in the case Eternity Aqua would kick my current and only Aquatic Bvlgari Aqva's butt big time. It is easy to wear, deeply masculine and sexy as a hell. This is only smell I cant stop sniffing. I have some juice left and I am sure as soon as it finishes I will have to replace with a small bottle to wear when I want to smell good and enjoy myself then to think of pleasing others. I am quite sure It will please others too as long as it lived on your skin. I will give it a shot in hot summer days and it Might make the list. as My list of top 15 is all gems I found in my life so far with trial and error with 100s of fragrance, and I FEEL HONOURED TO ADMIT, **ETERNITY AQUA** GOT SPECIAL LOVE AMONG ALL FOR THE SMELL. I have to repeat its AMAZING!!!!!!!!!! and when I say SPECIAL, I MEAN IT! So give it a try and see it migth work wonder for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="563535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=563535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent557202" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc557202" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AZJeff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/614510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.614510.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AZJeff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Uomo-730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uomo?"title="Uomo?"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma557202ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd557202" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/614510">AZJeff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-10">01/10/15 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like the smell of this. It's slightly sweet, fresh, and crisp. I do notice the "cucumber" note which adds to the refreshing part of this fragrance. I'm not sure how this compares with "Eternity" but I think this one smells better. As far as I can tell by comparing a few other aqua version fragrances,  I think I like some other ones better then this one. This one was nice enough to try out and I recommend to try it out, if you like "aqua" version fragrances or just trying to find something different to wear during the hot months of the year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="557202"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=557202#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent543908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc543908" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glaggaglagga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/707974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.707974.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glaggaglagga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carven/Carven-Vetiver-28013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carven Vetiver"title="Carven Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma543908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd543908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/707974">Glaggaglagga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-11-25">11/25/14 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am always amused that a fragrance called "Eternity" does not last for eternity!<br />
<br />
At first, it smells pretty much like a lot of other aquatics, but persevere with this as the drydown is a sweet steamy warmth with a floral element - not at all harsh. <br />
<br />
Unusually for Calvin Klein fragrances it has got pretty good longevity. It lasts most of the day on my skin with moderate sileage, therefore giving decent value for money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="543908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=543908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent542328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc542328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zufar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/116767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zufar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Nio-10244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nio"title="Nio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma542328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd542328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/116767">zufar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-11-19">11/19/14 07:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very refreshing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc507907" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="osiris5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/611837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.611837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="osiris5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma507907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd507907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/611837">osiris5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-07-26">07/26/14 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although I'm not a great fan of Calvin Klein perfumes, this one is an exception. <br />
It is very great perfume. wow<br />
And for a aquatic it behaves very stylish and not as prominent like other aquatics.<br />
But you won't find any aquatic notes. That is what makes this perfume so special. the notes are very fresh, cucumber, green and citric notes. In the middle the lotus with its typical flowery-soapy like scent opens.<br />
This note is underlined with plum, pepper and lavender. a really great combination that gives that flowery-aromatic scent and that stays to the end.<br />
Sandalwood, patouchili and musk give the finishing touch.<br />
It has a great silage and longevity.yes  y can wear it in all occasions.<br />
This is a nice perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="507907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=507907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent507715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc507676" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nihilil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/758474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nihilil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma507676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd507676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); I 'get it' but I can't stand it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="507676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=507676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent498936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/118121">khalid al mudares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-06-25">06/25/14 03:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it is relay refreshing ozonic perfume but it is like other CK perfumes fade away fast but not faster than CKfree which dose not last more than half a hour in spite of its nice perfume.these perfume i don recommend for more than two hours time so you need to hold the perfume bottle in your pocket and have a spray every hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="498936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=498936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent494053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc494053" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WayneDN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/295973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.295973.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WayneDN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-Eau-de-Parfum-62311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma494053ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd494053" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/295973">WayneDN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-06-09">06/09/14 17:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A wonderful summer scent for during the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="494053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=494053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent493543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc493543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blowhard69"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/794298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.794298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blowhard69" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-276.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.276.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One"title="CK One"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma493543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd493543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/794298">Blowhard69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-06-07">06/07/14 19:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The cucumber and lotus here make odd bedfellows and don't really mesh, this comes off a bit too green and synthetic towards the middle and has a high synthetic core to it that undoes all the great things going for this fragrance in regards to excellent performance, longevity, sillage and affordability.  The top is great at first, a heavy dose of citrus and cucumber in the vein of Polo Blue but with more power and strength behind it thanks to the heavy dose of synthetic green and aromatic elements.  The problem is that the lotus and green synthetics don't mesh well with the cucumber and plum, creating a dissonance that is cloying and abrasive around the 30 minute mark.  Projection is mammoth for an aromatic aquatic, easily heavy for most of the way through and longevity is outstanding at over 8 hours consistently after having worn it over the last week, but unfortunately the scent just doesn't blend well and its synthetic core really shows itself quickly and this one never really evolves beyond the top and mid, making for a very linear wear and one that alienates quickly.  Amazing performance, best kept for every once in awhile as this is simply too cloying and synthetic for your sinuses for daily wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="493543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=493543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent488922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc488922" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Highschoolrugbyboy64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/792509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Highschoolrugbyboy64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma488922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd488922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/792509">Highschoolrugbyboy64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-05-25">05/25/14 00:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Awesome every day use, summer fragrance. Its like a nice aquatic with an awesome woody back ground. Maybe the sandalwood but the dry down is sweet and nice. Girls and my girlfriend love this fragrance! 6 hour longevity and moderate projection and ok silliage. So all around this is a a good, everyday cologne for highschools or the younger crowd</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="488922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=488922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent486092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc486092" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erkek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.770239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erkek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Knowing-548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Knowing"title="Knowing"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma486092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd486092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770239">erkek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-05-16">05/16/14 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good for daily usage. Fresh and you know this scents similar to each other. When benchmarking U dont expectation such scents to legendary. Because you know its all blue:)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="486092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=486092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent474516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc474516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aqua_de_la_vita"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.454752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aqua_de_la_vita" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-pour-Homme-1994-483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"title="Dolce&Gabbana pour Homme (1994)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma474516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd474516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/454752">aqua_de_la_vita</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-04-09">04/09/14 23:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update,<br />
What I failed to mention about this fragrance is that it's perfect for daytime casual wear not meant for a sophisticated evening where your wanting to impress someone special. Ck has lighter and fresh notes not a heavier deep aroma like CK Euphoria. After reading the reviews that this frag smells like Polo Blue..I tried out myself and YA big time very similar.  <br />
<br />
Ck Eternity Aqua has a very aquatic scent mixed with both a light floral/woodsy notes. After it dries dowm I'm able to smell lavender and plum combined with cedar and patchouli which gives this frag a real aromatic aroma. <br />
A lot would appreciate the appealing qualities that comes from this frag which is enjoyable during the spring and summer months without it being offensive to anyone. The frag takes on slightly powdery sweet scent which is from musk giving it a really appealing fragrance. <br />
Longevity and Silage are both very good...<br />
Overall though,<br />
I know that a lot of people consider this collections for a much longer age group. I would agree that CK is trying to go after the age group that's from 20-30yrs old which wants a freshness and aromatic scent which this one has. Thou I'm not in that age group I'm still able to enjoy this fragrance just like a lot are able to. <br />
Overall rating....6.5/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="474516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=474516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent474210" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc474210" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pier39lab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/211332"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.211332.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pier39lab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma474210ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd474210" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/211332">pier39lab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-04-09">04/09/14 04:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really well formulated aquatic fragrance surprisingly without sea or water accords. I could smell citruses right after I unboxed it, a bit harsh in my opinion. Not sure why but I don't smell cucumber at all, I can't say there isn't, but I guess gets mixed up with the plum. Try Abercrombie &amp; Fitch Cologne 41 which opens up to a predominantly cucumber burst (it's almost like I rub a freshly cut cucumber on my skin and then smelling off it)<br />
What I do sense is cool green notes that evolves after the opening fades away (ten minutes?), followed by hints of lavender and musk. <br />
<br />
Reminds me of Bvlgari Aqva + Davidoff Cool Water + a spicy fragrance, all rolled into one.<br />
I can't agree more, it smells just like RL Polo Blue, not the opening so much because Polo Blue opens with Melon (but dissipates quickly) and CK Eternity Aqua opens with citruses and plum.<br />
<br />
It was a blind buy based on reviews here and I don't regret it. <br />
It suits best for a lunch date, preferably at an open air restaurant facing a sea or a lush green lawn.<br />
<br />
<br />
Sillage: 7<br />
Longevity: 6, better on skin than on clothes.<br />
Fragrance: 8</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="474210"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=474210#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent462862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53533">daynierds</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-03-03">03/03/14 04:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not believe this is a MUST have as some say...neither a blind buy..I just sample this 30 minutes ago and from the first moment you feel something cheap smelling, rude, sharp...etc..., I do not care if it evolves over time, maybe not even that...I just cannot stand this first minutes or hour....at the same price tag you can find much more quality fragrances, e.g: mont blanc individuel, he wood, rocky mountain good, versace eau fraice, versace pour homme, ence noir, lalique white, versace the dramer and even cheaper...lanvin l 'homme, lanvin l'homme sport...just to cite a few..each of this is 1 or 2 classes above</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/743998">HALEY-SUE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-02-09">02/09/14 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is my love's favorite. I prefer Polo Blue to it, but this one is very nice indeed. S.m.o.o.t.h. &amp; sexy smelling. It does have an aquatic smell. So many men's fragrances say 'aqua' or 'blue' and wind up smelling like soap or flowers.  I get the citrus and cukes in this, and I always love sandalwood but the cedar in it, I think, is what makes it work with the rest. It 'greens' it up a bit.<br />
I don't find it long-lasting however. I love that it's not over-powering &amp; smells definitely masculine. Good thing-or I'd probably use it all up on myself !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="455424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=455424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent455183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/658431">Mrbigbigtoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-01-14">01/14/14 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This really does remind me of light blue only this is a little sweeter.<br />
It does last a lot longer than light blue also and is way cheaper but I'm sticking to light blue:) There isn't anything bad because it smells really good it's just not original at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc445674" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nick M"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/661001"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.661001.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nick M" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma445674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd445674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/661001">Nick M</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-01-12">01/12/14 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's OK but I get a 'hotel pool' note mixed in. I wouldn't say it's harsh like chlorine, but it does remind me of that unfortunately. It's very straightforward and you will know immediately if it's for you -- not the most complex scent. Unless it's love at first sniff, I would recommend picking one of the Eternity Summer's instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="445674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=445674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent436312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very fresh,clean and soft. Longevity 4-5 hours and Sillage is good. When I wear Calvin Klein Eternity Aqua I got most compliments from my friends. This stuff better than CK Eternity... I use Chanel Platinum Egoiste and Chanel Bleu.. But when I wear CK Eternity Aqua people ask me : What's your perfume ? What's your perfume ? Really most compliments Eternity Aqua trust me. This stuff light remains for winter. Only wear this stuff summer and spring... <br />
<br />
Projection : 9/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="417116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=417116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent408320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc402024" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ltj559"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ltj559" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma402024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd402024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560868">ltj559</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-09-01">09/01/13 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my go-to default scent when I don't know what else to wear. There are tons of similar summery aquatics out there, but IMO this one does it the best. Just a good all around fragrance for pretty much any occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="402024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=402024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8098" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent168794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc168794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="soleroc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/76838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.76838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="soleroc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma168794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd168794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/76838">soleroc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-07-29">07/29/11 01:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hey all!  <br />
<br />
        I have been into fragrance since the age of 11; I am now 29 and my taste along with my nose has evolved over the years.  We all remember wearing various cK frags along with those of Tommy Hilfiger and Hugo Boss as teens.  Now, I am in no way an expert, but merely an enthusiast.  And if I have learned one thing over the years it is that - it doesn't matter who's name is on the bottle, but only what actually smells nice to each individual.  A few years ago I thought that I had "outgrown" certain designers and their frags, but that is just closed minded and not fair.  It's not fair to the designer nor to yourself and your nose, lol.  I have come to appreciate straight forward fragrances like this one.  Eternity Aqua.  What could be more self explanitory than that?  You know what you are getting yourself into right away, and I like that.  CK did not hide this fragrnace behind a "color" name that is in many cases misleading (i.e. Polo Blue &amp; Bleu de Chanel - neither of which are aquatics btw, sorry plap17), but let you know upfront.  If you are not interested in an aquatic and find them boring or run-of-the-mill then don't test this.  Why waste your time?  <br />
<br />
         Anyway, now that I got that out of the way, I find this fragrance to be very nice.  It's longevity is around 8-12 hours on me and projects quite nicely.  If someone were to give you a hug 10 hours after application, she/he would definitely take notice and compliment :D  <br />
<br />
Now, as the name reads, this IS an aquatic &amp; there are VERY many aquatics out there. However, this one is - IMO, very well done.  It is clean, fresh and natural.  Very nice and appropriate for anyone and anytime.  Most would say that this is a summer scent, but what is wrong with smelling clean, fresh and natural all year round?  I personally like to wear an aquatic occasionally in the winter to remind me of summer and the salty sea air.  Ok, I've rambled on long enough.  This is an excellent aquatic. That's what it is and that's what it should be properly &amp; appropriately compared to. <br />
<br />
Thanks all,<br />
JJ</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="168794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=168794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1077637" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;     <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent665730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="simon.edwards"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934356"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.934356.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="simon.edwards" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Bvlgari-Man-9403.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9403.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bvlgari Man"title="Bvlgari Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934356">simon.edwards</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-10">01/10/16 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something about the Eternity frags that always has a nasty 'green' chemical dry-down to it. As far as aquatic scents go, its not bad, and does moderately in terms of projection and longevity. Its unoffensive and wearable anywhere - its just not stand-out. Then again, its not expensive. In that respect, you get what you pay for, but like I said, the dry-down leaves little to be desired.<br />
<br />
Have a great day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="665730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=665730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent667349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/972626">mountain72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-15">01/15/16 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very underrated fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="667349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=667349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="c_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1484213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="c_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Acqua-Essenziale-Blu-24788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Essenziale Blu"title="Acqua Essenziale Blu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484213">c_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-30">04/30/22 03:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, bit soapy, very neutral. The scent itself is pleasant but imo it lacks of personality. I totally get the Eternity DNA, though. I guess it's perfect for anyone who wants to smell fresh and clean after a shower and keep it intimate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="1553868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=1553868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent462862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc462862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daynierds"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.53533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="daynierds" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Midnight-in-Paris-9685.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9685.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight in Paris"title="Midnight in Paris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma462862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd462862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53533">daynierds</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-03-03">03/03/14 04:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not believe this is a MUST have as some say...neither a blind buy..I just sample this 30 minutes ago and from the first moment you feel something cheap smelling, rude, sharp...etc..., I do not care if it evolves over time, maybe not even that...I just cannot stand this first minutes or hour....at the same price tag you can find much more quality fragrances, e.g: mont blanc individuel, he wood, rocky mountain good, versace eau fraice, versace pour homme, ence noir, lalique white, versace the dramer and even cheaper...lanvin l 'homme, lanvin l'homme sport...just to cite a few..each of this is 1 or 2 classes above</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8098"comment_id="462862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-Aqua-for-Men-8098.html?ccid=462862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent436312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc436312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="livio.marucci"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/54618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.54618.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="livio.marucci" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Guerlain-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-2016-47793.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47793.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guerlain Homme Eau de Parfum (2016)"title="Guerlain Homme Eau de Parfum (2016)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma436312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd436312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);         <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/20210/news.20210-60x64.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/news/Versace-Crystal-Noir-Twenty-Years-Later-20210.html#cc276278"><span class="link-span"></span>
                        <span class="ztworowseclipse">Versace Crystal Noir: Twenty Years Later</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Hello I&#039;m a newbie to this layering. I have a wonderful but kind of overpowering frankincense and myrrh bought whipped body butter. I wondered if there was any possible way that the crystal Noir they are well with this and if not what would?">by

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });

</script>
